title: Takeshi Natori
text:
was a Japanese <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player. He played for <a href="Japan%20national%20football%20team">Japan national team</a>.
National team career.
In May 1934, when Natori was a <a href="Waseda%20University">Waseda University</a> student, he was selected <a href="Japan%20national%20football%20team">Japan national team</a> for <a href="Football%20at%20the%201934%20Far%20Eastern%20Championship%20Games">1934 Far Eastern Championship Games</a> in <a href="Manila">Manila</a>. At this competition, on May 20, he debuted and scored a goal against <a href="Chinese%20Taipei%20national%20football%20team">Republic of China</a>.
